survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Biodegradable Takeout Packaging Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on the use of biodegradable takeout packaging to understand satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you order takeout food?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are clear and cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you order takeout food?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.

questions.question_text: Have you noticed biodegradable packaging being used in your recent takeout orders?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include an 'I'm not sure' option for accuracy.

script.question_text: Have you noticed biodegradable packaging being used in your recent takeout orders?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of biodegradable takeout packaging you have encountered?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered with 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include a 'Not applicable' option for those who haven't encountered biodegradable packaging.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of biodegradable takeout packaging you have encountered?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is answered with 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for biodegradable takeout packaging?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for detailed responses. Encourage participants to provide specific suggestions.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for biodegradable takeout packaging?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small additional fee for biodegradable takeout packaging?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include a 'Depends on the amount' option for nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small additional fee for biodegradable takeout packaging?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all participants.
